casebody.data:
No. 10-1191. Dawn S. Sherman, a Minor, Through Robert I. Sherman, Her Father and Next Friend, on Behalf of Herself and All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioner v. Christopher Koch, Illinois State Superintendent of Education. 565 U.S. 815, 132 S. Ct. 92,

181 L. Ed. 2d 22,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 6890. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 623 F.3d 501.
